name: adm1
description: first level administrative subdivision e.g.  counties in Kenya

name: adm2
description: second level administrative subdivision within the first level subdivision e.g. sub-counties in Kenya

name: adm3
description: third level administrative subdivision within the second level subdivision e.g. wards in Kenya

name: adm4
description: fourth level administrative subdivision within the second level subdivision e.g. wards in Kenya

name: adm5
description: fifth level administrative subdivision within the second level subdivision e.g. wards in Kenya

name: location
description: name of the location of the experiment

name: site
description: name of the sub-location of the experiment

name: trial_id
description: identifier of a single trial (that may have treatments and replicates); should be unique witin dataset_id

name: reference
description: reference to source if the data set is a compilation

name: start_date
description: experiment start (planting) date in "yyyy-mm-dd", "yyyy-mm", or "yyyy" format

name: end_date
description: experiment end (harvest) date in "yyyy-mm-dd", "yyyy-mm", or "yyyy" format

name: on_farm
description: is this observation on farm (not on station)

name: is_survey
description: is this observation from a survey (not an experiment)

name: intercrops
description: other crop grown together with the main crop

name: previous_crop
description: crop grown on this plot in the prior season

name: crop_rotation
description: crops grown in rotation on this plot

name: observation_date
notes: For experiments with, e.g. intermediate crop cuts; or for surveys

name: yield
description: fresh weight biomass of the main harvestable parts at maturity

name: residue_yield
description: fresh weight biomass of the above ground biomess except for the harvestable parts at maturity

name: N_splits
description: Number of splits in the N_fertilizer application

name: P_fertilizer
description: P applied in inorganic fertilizer (as P, not P2O5)

name: K_fertilizer
description: K applied in inorganic fertilizer (as K, not K2O)
